akn:section.akn:heading: Rule of construction on equalized spending

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 6576. Rule of construction on equalized spending Nothing in this subchapter shall be construed to mandate equalized spending per pupil for a State, local educational agency, or school. (Pub. L. 89–10, title I, § 1605, formerly § 1906, as added Pub. L. 107–110, title I, § 101, Jan. 8, 2002, 115 Stat. 1619; renumbered § 1605, Pub. L. 114–95, title I, § 1501(a)(5), Dec. 10, 2015, 129 Stat. 1906.)
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsA prior section 1605 of Pub. L. 89–10 was classified to section 6515 of this title, prior to repeal by Pub. L. 114–95.
